description: Phalanx Team has released “HUANG,” a new board game designed by Reiner Knizia, set during the ancient Chinese Warring States period. The game, which accommodates 2 to 4 players, combines elements of area control, tile placement, and set collection, with an average playtime of around 90 minutes. Players take on the roles of leaders from...
title: Phalanx Team Releases New Board Game “HUANG” Designed by Reiner Knizia

description: With just three days remaining in its Kickstarter campaign, “Iz’Areth” by Fireball in a Teacup Press is close to turning a dream into reality. The campaign has already surpassed its initial goal of $5,000, with a current pledge total of $5,138 from 44 backers. This new realm in the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game universe is scheduled...
title: Final Days to Join the Kickstarter Campaign for “Iz’Areth,” a New Pathfinder Campaign Setting

description: Possum Creek Games has announced the release of their new tabletop RPG, “Yazeba’s Bed & Breakfast.” The game is now available for purchase in both hardcover and digital formats. Designed to evoke a sense of warmth and community, “Yazeba’s Bed & Breakfast” offers an engaging experience set in a charming, wooded bed and breakfast environment....
title: Possum Creek Games Releases “Yazeba’s Bed & Breakfast” with Community Event in Philadelphia
